name: gulp-makejson
description: creates json from source files and pipes the resulting json down to the next plugin

scripts.release: (git pull origin master && npm version patch && git push origin master && git checkout release && git merge master && git push origin release && git checkout master)
scripts.startdev: (git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm install)

author: Smart Coordination GmbH <office@push.rocks> (https://push.rocks)
